name: Green Power
overview:
Established in the year 2002, at Noida (Uttar Pradesh, India), we “Green Power International Pvt. Ltd.”, are known as the prominent Manufacturer, Trader and Supplier of a comprehensive assortment of Gas Gensets, Biogas Purification System, H2S Scrubbers, DRUPS suitable for natural gas, bio or sewage gas, CNG, Piped Natural Gas etc. These products are manufactured using quality approved raw material and advanced technology. Our complete product range is designed with high precision in order to meet the set industrial standards.

Product Portfolio:

Natural Gas Gensets Biogas Gensets E2P Gas Gensets Biogas Purification System DRUPS Systems Turnkey Projects

Vision:

“To maintain dominant market leadership position in gas based engines and heat recovery systems.” “To create significant presence in allied businesses including Renewable Energy Sources.” “To achieve over 20% of total revenue from overseas market.” “To become best employer in our industry.”

Client Satisfaction:

Our organization strives hard to attain maximum client satisfaction by manufacturing, trading and supplying a comprehensive assortment of Gas Gensets, H2S Scrubbers, DRUPS and Gas Engine. We believe in ethical business practices and make transparent dealings with our honored clients.

Why Us ?:

We have carved out a niche in the market by offering premium quality products to our clients. The key factors for which we have received appreciation from our clients all across the globe include:

International quality standard range Well equipped manufacturing facility Expert team of engineers, industrial designers and other supporting staff Customized packaging Competitive prices
